channel.title: Help Please
channel.description: I am using testscape and I can only make the character named Admin can spawn items. How can i make it so anyone i changed the player rights to 3 can spawn.[br][size=1]Posted at: July 31, 2006, 12:14:23 AM[/size][hr]Any1?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 31, 2006, 10:38:31 AM[/size][hr]I'm just talking to myself eh?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 31, 2006, 11:11:08 AM[/size][hr]Talk to myself all day eh?

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

In client.java, look for something that says this…

}
else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”)

add this to it…

&& playerRights >= 3)

To make it look like this…

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}

Read full topic
